name: Hunter Nightmare
description:
HunterNightmare "is a horror survival game suitable for 1-2 players.
As hunters, you were commissioned to come to this village, but gradually you found that you couldn't find a way out and there was a terrifying creature hovering around the building. Don't let 'it' discover you.

You will need to escape, hide, and use items from the area to survive.
You cannot defeat monsters. Search for items scattered in the area. Burning three cursed items among numerous items will lead to the death of the monster, and you will achieve victory.

Features:
Collaborate online games with 1-2 players
You can also play with your friends or play alone.
If you feel uneasy alone, you can also send invitations to your friends.

single player mode
Only you and the monster are on the battlefield. It will not hinder anyone.

Every time there is a different gaming experience
All cursed items are randomly placed each time.
Sometimes it's a normal item, sometimes it's a cursed item. Please use your luck wisely.

Capable enemy
Pay attention to the sound
Sound is very important. You can detect approaching enemies through sound.
